p:
To assess the relationship among variables, correlation coefficient, multivariate analysis including robust principle component analysis (RPCA) was applied using R packages (see http://cran.r-project.org/). PCA is extensively applied to decrease data dimension and to extract relationship among the experimental variables. The PCA method involves an unsupervised classification process that includes determining the geochemical association based on correlation anlysis or similarity among variables to be classified according to their source similarity
48 .
